Name: Keyboard Warrior
About the game: One day dreamer wants to be a keyboard warrior and starts his adventure. Keyboard Warrior is a platform game packed with annoying jokes that need to use many buttons You can attack with three different attack words. Two health upgrades. Two jump upgrades. Platform elements: windmills, lighthouses, turrets ... If you do not want to use more buttons you can also attack with 'alt' and 'ctrl. Gameplay: Play using the words in the upper left corner of the screen. You need to write heal from the keyboard for heal And you need to write hit from the keyboard for attack and so on ...
